H3.text: who is the actor that plays sneaky pete. Giovanni Ribisi

A4.text: Ribisi starred as Marius/“Pete” in the Amazon series Sneaky Pete over its three seasons.

A5.text: He had starring roles in the TV sitcom Dads (2013–2014) and the crime drama series Sneaky Pete (2015–2019).
